# LLC Operations Intake Interview System

This interview gathers the comprehensive context needed for all 9 LLC-Ops agents to operate with precision.

## Interview Sections

### Section 1: Entity Basics
- LLC name, state, formation date
- EIN status
- Member structure
- Registered agent setup
- Operating agreement status

### Section 2: Financial Picture
- Revenue range (annual/monthly)
- Primary income sources
- Cash position / runway
- Banking setup
- Existing bookkeeping/accounting

### Section 3: Expense Profile
- Major expense categories
- Equipment and assets
- Software/SaaS stack
- Home office situation
- Vehicle usage for business

### Section 4: Tax Situation
- Current tax structure (disregarded/S-Corp)
- Estimated tax payment status
- Prior year filing status
- Known tax obligations
- CPA/tax professional relationship

### Section 5: Compliance Status
- Annual report history
- Any missed deadlines
- Outstanding filings
- Audit history
- Known issues

### Section 6: Protection & Risk
- Insurance coverage
- Contract templates in use
- Liability concerns
- Client concentration
- IP/confidentiality needs

### Section 7: Goals & Pain Points
- Immediate concerns
- What keeps you up at night
- Short-term goals (90 days)
- Annual goals
- Knowledge gaps to fill

### Section 8: Working Style
- How do you track expenses currently?
- Preferred communication style
- Time availability for LLC tasks
- DIY vs delegation preference
- Learning interests

## Output

After completing the interview, generates:
1. `LLC_PROFILE.md` - Comprehensive business profile
2. `AGENT_CONTEXT.md` - Pre-loaded context for all agents
3. `PRIORITY_ACTIONS.md` - Immediate actions needed
4. `KNOWLEDGE_GAPS.md` - Teaching priorities for Mentor
